content.rendered:
In every gas station, store, or restaurant you see, you can observe that their signs are much higher than the rest and can be seen for a mile away. These signs are called pole signs because the sign is installed on top of a tall pole.

Pole signs are the best type of signs a business can use because not only do they let people know that you are in the area, they also tell people that you are open and ready to assist. They are also permanent and can be seen miles away, which is perfect if you want people to know you are there.

Royal Signs & Awnings is the best in pole sign design, manufacturing, and installation in Rosenberg, TX. Our team has a fast and accommodating customer support and a talented team of fabricators and installers who can design the perfect pole sign for your business and location. We even make recommendations and customizations to make sure you get what you paid for.

Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation with a Pole Sign Expert!

Illuminated Pole Signs

Illuminated or lighted pole signs are special pole signs that can be lit open late at night. They are usually 20 feet and up, allowing travelers to see your business from a mile away and check them out for their needs.

These signs are also made with high-quality materials and a great investment for your business and company. Although it can be expensive at first, it will drive in traffic, which means it will pay for itself as time passes.

If you are not sure if illuminated pole signs are perfect for you, our Rosenberg team can evaluate your business and see if it will benefit the space. We will also check if it will give you the right amount of impressions from the people around your area.

Pylon & Tenant Signs

Aside from illuminated pole signs, we can also do pylon and tenant signs that are higher than your business building. These types of signs are made from heavier materials, and they have a wider support structure to hold the sign.

These types of signs also include a lot of information, especially the tenants of a complex or commercial facility. It is also great for business parks and malls.

Not so sure if you will be ok with these types of signs? Let our Rosenberg team check your place out, and we will see which signs are perfect for you.

Free Pole Sign Consultation

Our team here at Royal Signs & Awnings is always ready to help you with your signage solutions. If you want pole signs, we can design it for you based on your requirements, budget, and location. Once it is designed and manufactured, we will install it in key areas of your business, which will give it the best exposure. Call our Rosenberg team today to find out how we can help you with your business goals.

Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation with a Pole Sign Expert!
